package org.javaro.lecture; public class Ex7_12 { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub Animal anim = new Animal(); anim.setName("야용이"); System.out.println(anim.getName() + "는" + anim.identify()); } } class Animal { String name; public void setName(String name) { this.name = name; } public String getName() { return this.name; } public String identify() { return "동물"; } }
